professional_summary: Seasoned Oracle Database Administrator with 6+ years of expertise in database security and proactive support across production environments. Proficient in using Data Pump for data migration, RMAN for backups, and implementing high-availability solutions such as RAC and Data Guard.

key_responsibilities: Configuring and troubleshooting Oracle databases across multiple releases.
Implementing database security measures to ensure compliance and protection of sensitive data.
Providing proactive support for production environments through regular monitoring and optimization.

work_experience.company: Department of Education: Osseo School District ISD 279
key_responsibilities: Performing database installations and configurations according to SLA standards.
Conducting regular backups using RMAN and ensuring data integrity.
Designing and implementing efficient database solutions for district-wide applications.
Administering Oracle databases across multiple versions (10gR2
Collaborating with IT teams to resolve database-related issues and enhance system reliability.
Developing and implementing data models and designs using OUI and DBCA.
